text1: 1. Sit in a comfortable position in a quiet place.
text3: 3. Close your eyes, take deep breaths, and focus your whole body and mind on the sound.
text4: 4. When the sound stops, your whole body and mind will be fully focused on yourself, and meditation begins.
text5: 5. When you finish meditating and open your eyes, if the text on this screen appears three-dimensional, you have meditated correctly.
